00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Xml;
00024 using System.Net;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 
00027 namespace NyFolder.Utils {
00029     public static class Proxy {
00030         // ============================================
00031         // PUBLIC Members
00032         // ============================================
00033         public static string ConfigFile = "Proxy.conf";
00034 
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Members
00037         // ============================================
00038         public static bool UseProxyAuth;
00039         public static bool EnableProxy;
00040         public static string Username;
00041         public static string Password;
00042         public static string Host;
00043         public static int Port;
00044 
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PUBLIC Methods
00047         // ============================================
00049         public static void Initialize() {
00050             try {
00051                 string file = Path.Combine(Utils.Paths.ConfigDirectory, ConfigFile);
00052                 ParseProxyConfig(file);
00053             } catch {
00054                 UseProxyAuth = false;
00055                 EnableProxy = false;
00056                 Username = null;
00057                 Password = null;
00058                 Host = null;
00059                 Port = 80;
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00064         public static WebProxy GetConfig() {
00065             if (EnableProxy == false || Host == null)
00066                 return(null);
00067 
00068             WebProxy proxy = new WebProxy(Host, Port);
00069 
00070             if (UseProxyAuth == false || Username == null)
00071                 return(proxy);
00072 
00073             proxy.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(Username, Password);
00074 
00075             return(proxy);
00076         }
00077 
00079         public static void Save() {
00080             string file = Path.Combine(Paths.ConfigDirectory, ConfigFile);
00081             XmlTextWriter xmlWriter = new XmlTextWriter(file, Encoding.UTF8);
00082             xmlWriter.Formatting = Formatting.Indented;
00083 
00084             xmlWriter.WriteStartElement("proxy-settings");
00085             
00086             // Proxy
00087             xmlWriter.WriteStartElement("proxy");   
00088 
00089             // Enabled
00090             xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("enabled");
00091             xmlWriter.WriteString(EnableProxy.ToString());
00092             xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00093 
00094             if (EnableProxy == true) {
00095                 // Set Host
00096                 xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("host");
00097                 xmlWriter.WriteString(Host);
00098                 xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00099 
00100                 // Set Port
00101                 xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("port");
00102                 xmlWriter.WriteString(Port.ToString());
00103                 xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00104             }
00105             xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();
00106 
00107             // Proxy Auth
00108             xmlWriter.WriteStartElement("auth");    
00109 
00110             // Enabled
00111             xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("enabled");
00112             xmlWriter.WriteString(UseProxyAuth.ToString());
00113             xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00114 
00115             if (UseProxyAuth == true) {
00116                 // Set Host
00117                 xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("username");
00118                 xmlWriter.WriteString(Username);
00119                 xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00120 
00121                 // Set Port
00122                 xmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute("password");
00123                 xmlWriter.WriteString(Password);
00124                 xmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute();
00125             }
00126             xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();
00127             xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();
00128             xmlWriter.Close();
00129         }
00130 
00131         // ============================================
00132         // PRIVATE Methods
00133         // ============================================
00134         private static void ParseProxyConfig (string file) {
00135             XmlTextReader xmlReader = new XmlTextReader(file);
00136 
00137             while (xmlReader.Read()) {
00138                 if (xmlReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element && xmlReader.HasAttributes) {
00139                     string elementName = xmlReader.Name;
00140                     for (int i=0; i < xmlReader.AttributeCount; i++) {
00141                         xmlReader.MoveToAttribute(i);
00142 
00143                         if (xmlReader.Name == "enabled") {
00144                             if (elementName == "proxy") {
00145                                 EnableProxy = bool.Parse(xmlReader.Value);
00146                             } else if (elementName == "auth") {
00147                                 UseProxyAuth = bool.Parse(xmlReader.Value);
00148                             }
00149                         } else if (xmlReader.Name == "host") {
00150                             Host = xmlReader.Value;
00151                         } else if (xmlReader.Name == "port") {
00152                             Port = int.Parse(xmlReader.Value);
00153                         } else if (xmlReader.Name == "username") {
00154                             Username = xmlReader.Value;
00155                         } else if (xmlReader.Name == "password") {
00156                             Password = xmlReader.Value;
00157                         }
00158                     }
00159                 }
00160             }
00161 
00162             xmlReader.Close();
00163         }
00164     }
00165 }
